-- | Functions for working with HTTP Accept headers
--   
--   Functions for working with HTTP Accept headers. You may also want
--   check out parseHttpAccept from wai-extra:Network.Wai.Parse (it is not
--   tied to WAI in any way and some similar may make it into this package
--   eventually).
@package http-accept
@version 0.2

module Network.HTTP.Accept

-- | Select which Accept type to use
selectAcceptType :: [String] -> [ByteString] -> Maybe String
instance Match a => Match (Maybe a)
instance (Match a, Match b) => Match (a, b)
instance Eq a => Match (Pattern a)
